Control Name: Includes Entity, Subsidiary, Division, Operating Unit, and Functional Levels—The entity identifies and assesses risk at the entity, subsidiary, division, operating unit, and functional levels relevant to the achievement of objectives.

control_attributes.Control: Includes Entity, Subsidiary, Division, Operating Unit, and Functional Levels—The entity identifies and assesses risk at the entity, subsidiary, division, operating unit, and functional levels relevant to the achievement of objectives.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC3.2 COSO Principle 7: The entity identifies risks to the achievement of its objectives across the entity and analyzes risks as a basis for determining how the risks should be managed.
